sentences.en: "Dottie" is by far his best novel to date.
sentences.cn: 《多蒂》是他迄今为止最好的小说。

sentences.en: A black coat always looks smart and will never date.
sentences.cn: 黑色外套看起来总是很潇洒，而且永远也不会落伍。

sentences.en: Any entry arriving after the closing date will not be considered.
sentences.cn: 截止日期之后报名参赛的人将不予考虑。

sentences.en: As a sportsman, he is long past his sell-by date.
sentences.cn: 作为一名运动员，他早已风光不再。

sentences.en: For a year I dated a woman who was a research assistant.
sentences.cn: 有一年的时间，我一直和一个女助理研究员约会。

sentences.en: his decline dates from last summer
I wrote the date at the far left of the blackboard.
sentences.cn: 我把日期写在黑板的最左边。

sentences.en: In high school, he did not date very much.
sentences.cn: 中学的时候，他不常约会。

sentences.en: Make sure you sign and date it at the bottom.
sentences.cn: 一定要在底下签上姓名和日期。

sentences.en: Once the decision is reached, he can date and sign the sheet.
sentences.cn: 一旦做出决定，他就可以在那张表上签上日期和名字。

sentences.en: President Kaunda fulfilled his promise of announcing a date for the referendum.
sentences.cn: 卡翁达总统兑现了他的承诺，宣布了全民公决的日期。

sentences.en: She is without question the craziest person I've met to date.
sentences.cn: 她无疑是我到目前为止所遇到的最疯狂之人。

sentences.en: The band have moved forward their Leeds date to October 27.
sentences.cn: 乐队已把去利兹的日期提前至10月27号。

sentences.en: The community's links with Syria date back to biblical times.
sentences.cn: 这个团体与叙利亚的关系可以追溯到《圣经》时代。

sentences.en: The competition should have been rescheduled for a later date.
sentences.cn: 比赛本应另择日期。

sentences.en: The date on the letter was 30th August 1962.
sentences.cn: 信上的日期是1962年8月30日。

sentences.en: The election date had to be brought forward by two months.
sentences.cn: 选举日期必须提前两个月。

sentences.en: their finest work to date.
sentences.cn: 他们迄今为止最好的作品。

sentences.en: To date we have spent eight thousand pounds between us.
sentences.cn: 迄今我们总共已经花掉了8,000英镑。

sentences.en: We'll keep you up to date with any news.
sentences.cn: 一有新消息我们就会告诉你。

sentences.en: What’s today’s date?
sentences.cn: 今天几号？

sentences.en: You cannot ask for your money back before the agreed date.
sentences.cn: 约定的日期没到，你不能把钱要回去。

words.tran_cn: 可确定时代的，可确定年代的
陈旧的；过时的；有日期的
无日期的，无期限的；经住时间考验的；远古的
国际日期变更线；报纸写明的发稿日期及地址；新闻电头
约会；记日期的；注明日期
注有日期（date的过去式和过去分词）
过时；注明日期；始于（某一历史时期）

phrases.tran_cn: n. 从未见面的男女经第三者安排所作的约会
使记到最近时期；赶上时代潮流
发布日期；发行日期；出厂日期
adj. 最新的；最近的；现代的

trans.tran_cn: 日期，年代，时期，会晤时间，在某日，约会（对象），椰枣
trans.tran_en: a particular day of the month or year, especially shown by a number
a particular day of the month or year, especially shown by a number

trans.tran_cn: 确定…的日期，注明日期，过时，谈恋爱，显老
trans.tran_en: if clothing, art etc dates, it begins to look old-fashioned

trans.tran_cn: 起， 始； 进行约会
trans.tran_en: to have originated (at a specified time)
When you date something such as a letter or a cheque, you write that day's date on it
